issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
During a KS nook pass on v8 and Rhino on the Nook, I Noted that the text displayed from the Mac during the listening socket test would always end with a square character.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS with SDK 1.8.0.1 with rhino/v8
2) Navigate to Platform>Sockets>Listening socket
3) connect to the device from mac with "telnet (ip address) 40404"
4) Send some text

Result:
Square character displayed (See attached image)

Expected:
No square sent
fields.summary: Android: sockets - rhino/v8 - Listening socket on Nook displays sent text plus a square character which may indicate garbage character
fields.environment:
NookColor: 2.2.1
SDK: 1.8.0.1.v20111216124633
Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.7.201112152014
Mac OS 10.7.2

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
